item.title: 02 08 2023 Narratives
item.description: Birthdays Rui Hachimura (LAL) Klay Thompson (GSW) Grant Riller (CHA) Debut Kyrie is expected to debut for the Dallas Mavericks tonight. Dorian Finney-Smith & Spencer Dinwiddie are both available to make their debuts for the Brooklyn Nets.
